properties.areaDesc: Schuyler; Tompkins; Southern Cayuga; Seneca; Steuben; Yates
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 5 at 3:30PM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation
expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice
accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Winter
Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of
4 to 8 inches possible.

* WHERE...Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Steuben, Schuyler and
Tompkins counties.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM this evening
to 10 AM EST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late
Thursday night through Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
